title: Global Startup Weekend Melaka 2018 powered by Google Entrepreneurs
html:
Global Startup Weekend Melaka 2018 is a global event in more than 150 countries powered by Google for Entrepreneurs. More than 15,000 participants around the world will join this together in November. It is designed for anyone interested in receiving feedback on an idea, looking for a co-founder, or who want to learn a new skill. We also welcome anyone looking to test the entrepreneurial waters.

 

What will you get at Startup Weekend Melaka 2018?

·         Meet like-minded people, test business idea, identify potential partners

·         Risk-free environments: dive into the exhilarating startup world

·         Top-notch sharing & consulting by mentors

·         Pick up entrepreneurial mindset & skills (business model, marketing, product design etc)

·         Pitch your idea to prominent judges

 

For ticket price of RM40-80, you will also receive:

·         a .CO web domain

·         Certificate, T-shirt, 7 Meals, High-Speed Internet, Free Flow of Coffee

·         Access & experience working in co-working space

·         Free access to selected events by Startup Melaka & partners.

·         Promo code for courses by MaGIC School of Entrepreneur* (RM800-RM1,500 per programme)

·         & more!

Top 3 Winners: 

·         Free 3 month hotdesk at MaGIC Co-working space

·         Invitation to join MaGIC Pre-Accelerator bootcamp* (2-week programme)

Programme details: www.startupmelaka.com/startup-weekend

FB Event Page: /www.FB.com/events/551017758683880/

 

Ticket Registration (Credit Card): https://startupweekendmelaka2018.eventbrite.com/

 

For ticket purchase via bank transfer, please register using this link:

https://goo.gl/forms/qOrFSy4IMGQHT43M2



 

*For MMU students who have any question or need more information, please contact Soon-Aik (MMU Alumni) at 016-6226143 or  sachiew@hotmail.com



 

Event Organizer - Startup Melaka

Website: www.StartupMelaka.com

FB Page: www.FB.com/cafe.startup.melaka/

title: Job Vacancy :  TV Content Executives (Kuala Lumpur)
html:
Vision Plus Entertainment is hiring! We are an established media company in the region, offering the unique combination of quality TV content and customized media planning services for advertisers, sponsors and television broadcasters. Today, Vision Plus Entertainment represents major producers and networks from Hollywood, Europe, Canada, Australia, Taiwan, China and Hong Kong in distributing TV shows to broadcasters in over 15 countries throughout Asia.
 
We invite interested candidates to join our office in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Training will be provided.
 
 
 
TV Content Executives (Kuala Lumpur)
 
Responsibilities:  TV Content acquisition & distribution;
 
 Identify TV viewing trends & formulate buying and selling strategies;
 Manage & develop relationships with existing and new media clients;
 Develop new markets in designated geographical regions;
 Undertake negotiations with local and international buyers and sellers;
 
Requirements:
 Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree, Post Graduate Diploma in Business Studies/Administration/Management/Marketing /Communication or equivalent.
 Possess knowledge & interest in films and TV shows in various genres including current, old and upcoming movies, drama series, animation, lifestyle, etc.
 At least 2 years of work experience, preferably in Advertising/Media Planning/Public Relations or an equivalent field.
 Highly motivated, energetic, resourceful and persuasive, with excellent Interpersonal and communication skills.
 Good command of spoken and written English. Ability to speak & write Mandarin is definitely an added advantage.
 Willingness to travel internationally.
 Creative and must have knowledge of excel, word, pdf and powerpoint.
 Ambitious individuals with business acumen are encouraged to apply.
 
 
Interested?
Apply online or e-mail your updated CV to hrs@visionnewmedia.net stating current and expected salaries.
 
For more information about our company, please visit our website at: www.visionnewmedia.net.

title: JOB VACANCY : FULL STACK DEVELOPER - SUNPAY, KUALA LUMPUR
html:
FULL STACK DEVELOPER - SUNPAY, KUALA LUMPUR

  • Awesome organisation to work with
  • Permanent position
  • Work from home

We are an IT Consultancy based in Queensland, Australia and are looking to establish an offshore development and support centre to supplement our Australian based company. Initially we will employ one developer that will work from home or a serviced office. Daily stand-up and other meetings will be conducted using Skype. This will be supplemented by periodic face to face meetings.

Interviews will be conducted in Malaysia in October.

We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack .Net Developer (C# and Angular) who enjoys taking ownership of development projects. Experience with Azure or AWS will be very well regarded.

You will work closely with the Product Manager and other Developers implementing new features for a new product we are developing and integrating with a variety of 3rd party systems.

We are looking for:

  • Development experience building web applications.
  • Minimum of 3 years proven C# experience.
  • Experience with MS-SQL, Postgres or other RDMS.
  • Front-end development experience using JavaScript, JQuery, JSON, XML, HTML, Angular and other modern frameworks.
  • Cloud experience with AWS or Azure.
  • Good spoken and written English.

This is a highly rewarding and demanding opportunity working with a passionate and dedicated team.

Please feel free to contact Alan Macdonald on +61 7 5456 2631 for more information or a confidential discussion.

Job Type: Full-time

Experience:

  • software development: 1 year (Preferred)

title: JOB VACANCY : Base Digital Production Sdn Bhd
html:
Job Title : I/O Coordinator
Department : I/O
Report To : IT Manager
Location : Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Key Purpose of the Job:
I/O Coordinator will work closely with Base KL production team in managing all incoming and outgoing data from our facility.
 
Needs to Do:
• Manage and QC all incoming and outgoing data to/from clients via SFTP, Aspera, Signiant, etc.
• Rename data accurately as requested by production team and clients.
• Ensure all material is processed, published, and made available to production teams via Shotgun.
• Work closely with IT in archiving and restoring data to and from the tape backup system.
• Convert and extract media files into various file formats, codecs, or resolutions, as requested by production team.
• Assist and communicate to the editorial department with any discrepancies or changes in incoming data (shot length changes, scan requests).
 
Needs to Have:
• Expert knowledge of Python and Linux.
• Software knowledge of AE or Final Cut.
• In depth understanding of common file formats and resolutions (exr, dpx, cdl, mov, dng, etc).
• Must be able to learn and effectively use proprietary tools and pipeline.
• Ability to prioritize conflicting tasks and juggle multiple projects.
• Highly organized, exceptional time/project management skills.
 
Base Digital Production Sdn Bhd (1264189-U)
Unit M2-1, Level 2, The Vertical Podium, Avenue 3, Jalan Kerinchi, Bangsar South City, 59200 Kuala Lumpur
Website: http://www.base-fx.com
Clients: contact@base-fx.com I Employment: malaysiajobs@base-fx.com I Press: press@base-fx.com

html:
Dear All,

Global Startup Weekend Melaka 2018 is a global event in more than 150 countries powered by Google for Entrepreneurs. More than 15,000 participants around the world will join this together in November.

Date: 16-18 November 2018

Special Student Fee: RM 40*

Who should join?

Developers, Designers, Business Enthusiasts, Experts (Finance, Law, Business, Marketing etc), or ANYONE who is interested to test entrepreneurial water.
 

You will:

Form teams to test business ideas: Travel, Smart City, Fintech, LawTech, B2B, B2C or ANY idea

Receive direct feedback from mentors & judges (CEOs, Founders, Experts, Investor)

Have fun at a co-working space in Melaka!

Network with awesome people for future collaborations

Get 7 meals, T-shirt, free flow of coffee, prizes, certificate & more!

title: #eMpoweringYouths Across ASEAN programme  (access to project grant of up to USD 20,000 per project)
html:
We have recently launched a new initiative and programme – the #eMpowering Youths Across ASEAN programme in which participants of this programme will have their project management skills enhanced through intensive capacity building and access to project grant of up to USD 20,000 per project, to kick start their own social enterprise.

 

Ever dreamed of becoming a positive change maker in the society? Be eMpowered through the #eMpoweringYouths Across ASEAN programme!

 

The partnership programme between Maybank Foundation and ASEAN Foundation, focuses to build a sustainable and positive impact on ASEAN youth empowerment and the ASEAN community building efforts. The programme will enable ASEAN youths to elevate creativity, develop leadership skills and entrepreneurship spirit, while leaving lasting impacts on the ASEAN Community.

 

Participants of this programme will have their project management skills enhanced through intensive capacity building and access to project grant of up to USD 20,000 per project, to kickstart their own #socialenterprise.

 

If you’re citizens of ASEAN Member States between the age of 19 - 35 years old, join this initiative and turn you dream into reality.

 

Visit http://bit.ly/ASEANeMpoweringYouths to find out how you can empower others!

title: PRIDE Innovation and Transformation Challenge 2018 (PITCH) Competition
html:
Dear All,

MDEC (via Talent Team) will be organizing its first-ever PRIDE Innovation and Transformation Challenge 2018 (PITCH), which is essentially a competition that allows digital tech students from Premier Digital Tech University and Preferred Digital Tech Polytechnic to pitch their final year projects to the industry hence creating opportunities/benefits to both parties.

The requirements to undertake the PITCH are as follows:

  • Open to all project teams from Premier IHLs who have completed or are currently doing their Final Year Project (FYP) in Year 2018
  • A team must consist a minimum of two (2) members and maximum of four (4) members
  • A team is also allowed to have a maximum of one (1) international student
  • All submissions can only be done online before 15th Oct 2018 11.59pm at this link: http://bit.ly/PITCH-2018. Any other forms of submissions will be disqualified or not entertained.

Prizes

1st place

  • Cash prize of RM3,000
  • Certificate of participation for each team member
  • Challenge League Trophy

2nd place

  • Cash prize of RM2,000
  • Certificate of participation for each team member

3rd place

  • Cash prize of RM1,000
  • Certificate of participation for each team member

Thank you.

title: (1820) ONLINE PRE-COURSE ENROLLMENT FOR ALL DEGREE, DIPLOMA
html:
Dear Valued Students,

ONLINE PRE - COURSE ENROLLMENT FOR ALL DEGREE, DIPLOMA & FOUNDATION STUDENTS (Trimester 2, 2018/2019)

Examination and Records Unit is pleased to announce that the Pre-Course Enrollment Online (Subject Registration) for Trimester 2, 2018/2019 (1820) will begin on:

• 8 October 2018 for Degree students (Sem ID: 1820)

• 12 October 2018 for Diploma students and  Foundation students (Sem ID: 1820)

• Foundation/Diploma to Beta (Sem ID: 1820) - Date to be announce later

Attached is the Pre-Course Registration Schedule for your reference.

 

Please be informed that the maximum credit hours that you are allowed to enroll are as follows:

For Students Following Programme Structure:

• All students are required to enroll according to the credit hours stipulated in the programme structure provided by the Faculty. 

For Students Not Following Programme Structure:

• Min: 12 CH

• Max: Non Engineering - 20 CH, Engineering - 18 CH

 

IMPORTANT NOTE:

You are required to complete the Academic Advisory System (AAS) survey. You will not be able to proceed with pre-course enrollment for next trimester should you fail to do so. You are encouraged to complete the survey before 2 Dec 2018.  

Steps:

1.    Kindly visit MMU Portal and login to Camsys.

       The navigation to the AAS survey is as follows:

       Main Menu > Self Service > Survey > Academic Advisory System

2.    Upon submitting the survey, please meet your Academic advisor to complete the assessment process.

 

COURSE ENROLLMENT VIDEOS :

ERU has uploaded 4 videos regarding Course Enrollment as below:

1. How to ADD SUBJECT

2. How to DROP SUBJECT

3. How to view WEEKLY SCHEDULE

4. How to view ENROLLMENT SUMMARY

 

To view all the videos, please log in to MMU PORTAL and search :

SELF SERVICE > IT SERVICE GUIDELINE > CAMSYS

 

Reporting a Technical Problem

Problems with signing in, passwords and other system related issues should be reported at the MMU Service Desk to the “ITSD”Department:

https://camsyscrm.mmu.edu.my/psp/crmprd/?cmd=login&errorPg=ckreq&languageCd=ENG

 

Thank you and regards,

Examination and Records Unit

Multimedia University

title: Reasons to become an Oracle Certified Java Associate!
html:
Reasons to become an Oracle certified Java associate!

1. Java ranked top 3 languages by IEEE Spectrum.

2. High employability with Java skills.  You can search Jobstreet.com for Java job opportunities. Plenty of them!

3. 90% of Fortune 500 companies use Java.

4. Java is widely used in the following areas:  

  • Data Science
  • Machine Learning
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Games Development
  • Mobile Applications
  • Internet Of Things
  • Web Applications
  • Cloud Computing


Join us @ Oracle Academy for Java certification training :

  • Date: 9 Nov – 16 Nov 2018 @ FCI, Cyberjaya
  • Time: 9 am – 5pm
  • Fee: RM 1190
  • Contact Person: Mr. Nathar Shah( nathar.packier@mmu.edu.my)


Benefits under Oracle Academy
1. 25% discount voucher for the Java certification exam
2. Oracle Certifications are world recognized
3. Access to e-learning materials from Oracle Academy
4. Trainer is an Oracle certified professional


Thank you.

Regards,
Mr. Nathar Shah.

title: FINANCIAL CLEARANCE - TRIMESTER 1 2018/2019 (FINAL REMINDER)
html:
Dear Students,

Please be informed that your Camsys has been updated with the finalised tuition fees related billing for Trimester 1 2018/2019.

It has come to our attention that some students are constantly faced with the problem of financial barring. In order to help students avoid this problem, students are required to make full payment before due date of the invoice.

Please be informed, you also can check Summons and Supplementary Exam charges in CAMSYS (if any).

Students may check the charges at CAMSYS as follows:

Main Menu > Self Service > Campus Finances > Account Enquiry > Miscellaneous

Failure to make the Full Settlement by the stipulated date, you shall subject to FINANCIAL BARRING - Print exam slip (E), Register course for next Trimester (C) and View exam result (R).

Finance shall only uplift the financial barring upon Full Settlement and PAYMENT RECEIPTING - cleared in MMU’s bank account and updated in Camsys and further we shall not entertain nil or less fees settlement or unbarring before payment updating from the student.

The mode of clearance as follows:

1. Online bill payment - CIMB Clicks or Maybank2U.com (payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

2. Cash Deposit Machine/Over CIMB Bank Counter (CIMB Bank a/c no : 8003699122 and 8600902009 (Cyberjaya) or 8004674175 (Melaka), Payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

3. Credit Card (Online and MMU Finance Counter)

4. Bank draft (payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

5. International / foreign remittance - Swift code : CIBBMYKL 8004674175 (MELAKA),  CIBBMYKL 8003699122 (CYBERJAYA)

6. EPF Withdrawal Account 2 (e-mail to : ssc@mmu.edu.my)

7. E-Fee (http://www.mmu.edu.my/ > Division > Finance > MMU E-Payment)

8. We are pleased to announce that you may now pay tuition fee bills via JOMPAY with biller code 22202 by login to your preferred internet or mobile banking.

How do I pay my bill with JomPAY?

STEP 1 :  Look for JomPAY logo and biller code on your invoice through  CAMSYS

STEP 2 : Log on to your preferred Internet or Mobile Banking and look for JomPAY.

STEP 3 : Enter the JomPAY Biller Code and Reference Number ( refer to invoice in CAMSYS) and proceed for payment.

Please email us your proof of clearance to finance@mmu.edu.my or fax to 03-83125030 (Cyberjaya) or 06-2327446 (Melaka) for clearance updating purposes.

Pls contact us should you need further assistance (Cyberjaya : 03-8312 5141/5473/5135/5020/5936 or Melaka : 06-252 3452/3471)

Look forward for your immediate financial clearance.

Thank You and Wishing You Good Luck in your academic!!!

Credit Management
MMU Finance Division

title: FINANCIAL CLEARANCE - TRIMESTER 1 2018/2019 (SECOND REMINDER)
html:
Dear Students,

Please be informed that your Camsys has been updated with the finalised tuition fees related billing for Trimester 1 2018/2019.

It has come to our attention that some students are constantly faced with the problem of financial barring. In order to help students avoid this problem, students are required to make full payment before due date of the invoice.

Please be informed, you also can check Summons and Supplementary Exam charges in CAMSYS (if any).

Students may check the charges at CAMSYS as follows:

Main Menu > Self Service > Campus Finances > Account Enquiry > Miscellaneous

Failure to make the Full Settlement by the stipulated date, you shall subject to FINANCIAL BARRING - Print exam slip (E), Register course for next Trimester (C) and View exam result (R).

Finance shall only uplift the financial barring upon Full Settlement and PAYMENT RECEIPTING - cleared in MMU’s bank account and updated in Camsys and further we shall not entertain nil or less fees settlement or unbarring before payment updating from the student.

The mode of clearance as follows:

1. Online bill payment - CIMB Clicks or Maybank2U.com (payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

2. Cash Deposit Machine/Over CIMB Bank Counter (CIMB Bank a/c no : 8003699122 and 8600902009 (Cyberjaya) or 8004674175 (Melaka), Payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

3. Credit Card (Online and MMU Finance Counter)

4. Bank draft (payable to : UNIVERSITI TELEKOM SDN. BHD)

5. International / foreign remittance - Swift code : CIBBMYKL 8004674175 (MELAKA),  CIBBMYKL 8003699122 (CYBERJAYA)

6. EPF Withdrawal Account 2 (e-mail to : ssc@mmu.edu.my)

7. E-Fee (http://www.mmu.edu.my/ > Division > Finance > MMU E-Payment)

Please email us your proof of clearance to finance@mmu.edu.my or fax to 03-83125030 (Cyberjaya) or 06-2327446 (Melaka) for clearance updating purposes.

Pls contact us should you need further assistance (Cyberjaya : 03-8312 5141/5473/5135/5020/5936 or Melaka : 06-252 3452/3471)

Look forward for your immediate financial clearance.

Thank You and Wishing You Good Luck in your academic!!!

title: [ERU OFFICE] The Academic Advisory system (AAS) Now Open
html:
AsSalamu'alaikum and Good day.
 
Dear Valued Students,
 
 
Kindly be informed, the Academic Advisory System (AAS) has been opened for evaluation.
 
 
It is an obligation for every student to complete the assessment before continuing with the pre-subject registration in week 12. 
 
The assessment will take about 5-10 minutes times to complete. Failure to complete the assessment will result in the subject registration for the next trimester to be blocked.
 
 
Therefore, it is advisable for every student to complete the assessment and meet the advisor as early as possible to avoid any difficulties arise in the future.
 
 
Navigation to the AAS can be reached as follows: 
 
> Log into Camsys
> Main Menu
> Self Service
> Survey
> Academic Advisory System
 
Should you have any questions, kindly contact Ms Azlindawaty at azlinda@mmu.edu.my or Mr Shaiful Azman at shaiful@mmu.edu.my.
Your commitments are essential to the success of this program.
 
 
 
Thank you very much for your time.
 
 
EXAMINATION AND RECORDS UNIT.
MULTIMEDIA UNIVERSITY.

title: [INTERNSHIP OPPORTUNITIES] :LOCUS-T Sdn Bhd
html:
Dear Students,
 
Internship opportunities with LOCUS-T Sdn Bhd is available for your consideration and further action.
 
Brief information on LOCUS-T Sdn Bhd
LOCUS-T is an Award-Winning Internet Marketing Agency and one of the best SEO companies in Kuala Lumpur and Penang. Our dynamic SEO agency is packed with 18 years of Internet Marketing experience. Often called an Online Marketing Company as well, we tend to focus in Performance Marketing.
 
Internet Marketing is not foreign anymore in Malaysia, it is crucial for any business to strive for growth. With services such as SEO, ranking high on Google is a must for your website. Imagine your potential customer searches for products & services related to your business, but your website is nowhere to be found?
 
That is why in Malaysia, SEO is very important to make sure that your website always appears at the top, so that you could drive valuable traffic to your website and not to your competitors’. Our SEO Marketing specialists offer expert consultancy services that organically grow your web presence and place your website high up on search engine results.
 
 
 
Kindly refer to the attachment for further details.
 
We wish you all the best.
 
 
 
Note: please check internship availability with the company prior to applying.
 
 
 
Thank you.

title: Check list for Completion of Studies
html:
Dear All Graduating Students,

Please ensure you have fulfilled the following requirements for your completion of studies:

a) Completed minimum credit hours requirement (based on your programme and intake)

b) Taken and passed all the required subjects (based on your programme and intake)

c) Taken Bahasa Kebangsaan or exempted from taking Bahasa Kebangsaan - if you are eligible for exemption, please ensure the exemption appears in your academic achievement/ transcript. Please check your student handbook for the requirement.

d) MUET requirement of min Band 3 to graduate for UG

e) No out-standing with finance (fees, fine etc) or library

Thank you

title: Bantuan Kewangan Pelajar Orang Kurang Upaya (OKU) Di Institusi Pengajian Tinggi (IPT)
html:
SYARAT DAN GARIS PANDUAN UMUM

Bantuan ini merupakan keistimewaan yang diberikan kepada pelajar OKU. Oleh itu, ianya harus dibezakan dengan kemudahan-kemudahan lain yang turut diterima oleh pelajar bukan OKU. Ini bermakna sekiranya seseorang pelajar OKU itu menerima biasiswa atau kemudahan lain yang juga turut dinikmati oleh pelajar bukan OKU, maka pelajar OKU tersebut adalah layak menerima elaun ini.

Elaun khas ini tidak mengambil kira taraf pendapatan sebagai syarat kelayakan.

TEMPOH PEMBIAYAAN

Tempoh tajaan ini adalah tertakluk kepada surat tawaran asal institusi pengajian dan tidak melebihi tempoh maksimum penajaan seperti berikut :

(i)        Diploma                    -           3 Tahun

(ii)      Sarjana Muda            -           4 Tahun

(iii)     Sarjana                      -           2 Tahun

(iv)      Ph.D                         -           4 Tahun

SYARAT-SYARAT BANTUAN KEWANGAN PELAJAR OKU

i. Pelajar warganegara Malaysia;

ii. Pelajar berdaftar dengan Jabatan Kebajikan Masyarakat (JKM) dan telah mempunyai kad OKU;

iii. Kursus yang diikuti hendaklah diiktiraf oleh Agensi Kelayakan Malaysia (MQA) atau Jabatan Perkhidmatan Awam (JPA).

iv. Pelajar OKU yang menerima pinjaman pelajaran atau pembiayaan sendiri adalah layak menerima elemen wangsaku dan yuran pengajian. Penerima biasiswa pula layak mendapat wang saku sahaja;

v. Pelajar hendaklah sedang melanjutkan pengajian di mana-mana universiti awam atau IPTS (bawah seliaan KPT) atau Kolej Komuniti dan Politeknik;

vi. Pelajar yang mengikuti kursus separuh masa atau pengajian jarak jauh layak menerima bantuan kewangan ini;dan

vii. Pelajar OKU hendaklah bukan dalam tempoh cuti belajar bergaji (penuh/sebahagian).

 

KAEDAH BAYARAN

1. Orang Kurang Upaya (OKU)

  • a. Pelajar Sepenuh Masa (wang saku dan yuran pengajian)
    •  
      • Bantuan meliputi wang saku dan yuran pengajian yang kedua-duanya tidak melebihi RM5,000/setahun atau RM20,000 sepanjang tempoh pengajian pada satu peringkat pengajian (jika pinjaman pelajaran atau pembiayaan sendiri sahaja). Penerima biasiswa pula hanya layak wang saku sahaja.
      • Kadar bantuan adalah wang saku RM300/bulan dan bakinya adalah bantuan yuran tertakluk kepada RM5000 setahun bagi kedua-dua elemen. Sekiranya jumlah wang saku dan yuran pengajian tidak mencapai RM5000 setahun, lebihan tersebut tidak akan dibayar kepada pelajar dan tidak akan dibawa ke hadapan.
      • Penetapan kadar bayaran adalah berdasarkan kepada tahun kalendar. Ini bermakna tempoh yang layak adalah bermula dari tuntutan pertama dibuat dalam dalam tahun semasa.
      • Walau bagaimanapun, pelajar boleh memilih samada untuk bantuan bagi kedua-dua elemen bayaran atau yuran pengajian sahaja dalam tahun tersebut.
      • Bayaran akan dibuat berdasarkan tarikh tuntutan semasa dan tidak akan dikebelakangkan. Tuntutan untuk semester yang telah berlalu adalah tidak dibenarkan.

 

  • b. Pelajar Separuh Masa/Jarak Jauh (yuran pengajian sahaja) :
    •  
      • Bantuan tidak melebihi RM5,000 setahun atau RM20,000 sepanjang tempoh pengajian pada satu peringkat pengajian tertakluk kepada RM5,000 setahun. Penerima biasiswa termasuk yuran pengajian tidak layak menerima bantuan ini.
      • Bayaran yuran pengajian akan dibuat terus kepada IPT berkenaan pada setiap semester tertakluk kepada invois lengkap yang diterima; dan
      • Bayaran akan dibuat berdasarkan tarikh tuntutan semasa dan tidak akan dikebelakangkan. Tuntutan untuk semester yang telah berlalu adalah tidak dibenarkan.

 

TATACARA PERMOHONAN

PERMOHONAN / TUNTUTAN

Mulai tahun 2013 permohonan dan tuntutan bayaran BKOKU telah dijalankan secara atas talian (online) di laman web KPT (https://biasiswa.mohe.gov.my/bk_oku/login.php) .

Permohonan perlu mendaftar sebagai pengguna sistem terlebih dahulu sebelum membuat tuntutan.

Permohonan hendaklah dikemukakan kepada bahagian biasiswa KPT tidak lewat dari 30 hari pertama pada setiap semester bermula.

Permohonan dengan dokumen yang lengkap dan memenuhi syarat kelayakan yang ditetapkan perlu di pos atau serahan tangan ke alamat :-

Setiausaha Bahagian
Bahagian Biasiswa
Kementerian Pendidikan Tinggi
Aras 2, No.2, Menara 2,
Jalan P5/6, Presint 5,
62200 Putrajaya
(u.p: Unit Biasiswa)

 

DOKUMEN BANTUAN ELAUN WANG SAKU DAN YURAN PENGAJIAN PELAJAR OKU

a. Salinan Kad Pengenalan Pelajar;

b. Salinan Kad Jabatan Kebajikan Masyarakat (JKM);

c. Salinan Kad Pendaftaran / Pelajar;

d. Salinan surat tawaran pengajian;

e. Salinan keputusan peperiksaan terkini (bagi pelajar sedia ada);

f. Salinan buku akaun CIMB OR BIMB sahaja;

g. Invois asal yuran pengajian semester semasa yang dikeluarkan oleh institusi pengajian (jika tuntutan yuran belum dijelaskan oleh pelajar) / resit asal pembayaran yuran pengajian oleh pelajar (jika tuntutan yuran telah dijelaskan oleh pelajar).

title: Identity Management (IDM) - as of June 2018
QR Code Attendance Tracking System
html:
Dear students,

  • Students  are reminded to install QR code reader before attending your first class in Trimester 1 2018/19.

 

  • if you do not have or forget to bring your smart phone during your class, please get assistance from your lecturer to update the attendance manually.

 

  • If you have not yet register for any subject, you need to inform and provide your student ID to your lecturer for record purposes. At the same time, please register your subject immediately.

 

  • You may check your attendance in Camsys via navigation Self Service   >Academic Records   >Attendance Percentage by class within 24 hours. If your attendance is not updated, please inform your lecturer within 1 working day.

 

  • Below are the messages displayed after you have scanned the QR code and check in:

    Message Appear

    Senario

     

    Action need to be taken

    "Your attendance has been successfully updated."

     

    Successfully check in.

    Please check your attendance % in Camsys from time to time.

    “You are not allowed to check in as the current time is not the actual class duration.”

     

    If check in before or after allowed time.

    If you attended the class, please meet your lecturer to update manually.

    “The server did not recognize your username and password and their combination.”

     

    Check in during allowed time but Wrong IDM username and password . 

     

    Please contact ITSD for assistance.

    "Your password has expired. Kindly reset at SPM Portal (IDM)."

     

    Correct IDM username but password expired.

     

    Please contact ITSD for assistance.

    "Attendance already recorded for this student ID."

     

    Correct IDM username and password but already check in.

    Please check your attendance % in Camsys from time to time.

    “You are not register to this class”

    You have not registered to this class thus not able to check in.

    Please register this subject and get further help from ERU counter.

Step to update your attendance:

 

  • Download QR code reader application from App Store or Google Play

 

  • Scan QR code when displayed at screen by lecturer in your class

 

  • Key in your Student ID & IDM password and click “Sign in”

 

  • Message successful/unsuccessful will appear. Process Completed.

 

Please refer to the attached user manual. Should you have any problem, kindly email to azlinda@mmu.edu.my (Cyberjaya student) or shaiful.azman@mmu.edu.my (Melaka/Nusajaya student).

 

Thank You
Registrar Office
(Examination and Records Unit)
Multimedia University

Status Short

Status Long

Description

PASS

PASS

have obtained a GPA of 2.0 and above and will proceed to the next trimester on Pass status

PEND

PENDING

have obtained a GPA of 2.0 and above and have  been granted supplementary examination as first attempt (I) or incomplete grade for Industrial Training

SUPP

SUPPLEMENTARY

have  obtained a GPA of 2.0 and above and are allowed to sit the supplementary examinations  as second attempt (*) for the subjects in which they have failed  

PSUP

PENDING,SUPP

have  obtained a GPA of 2.0 and above have  been granted

i) supplementary examination as first attempt (I), and ii) supplementary examination as second attempt (*)

PRSU

PROBATION, SUPP

have  obtained a GPA of less than 2.0 and are allowed to sit the supplementary examinations  as second attempt (*) for the subjects in which they have failed

PPSU

PROBATION, PENDING, SUPP

have  obtained a GPA of less than 2.0 and  have been granted

i) supplementary examination as first attempt (I), and ii) supplementary examination as second attempt (*)

PRPD

PROBATION, PENDING

have  obtained a GPA of less than 2.0 and have been granted supplementary examination as first attempt (I)

PROB

PROBATION

have  obtained a GPA of less than 2.0 and will proceed to the next trimester on probation status

TERM

TERMINATED

have  obtained GPA of below 2.0 for two consecutive trimesters and a CGPA of below 2.0 and are terminated from the course

NA

NA

did not have a GPA for this trimester due to either the leave of absence, registered for Non Graded Subject or withdrawal of subject.*

title: Schindler's Open Day invitation
html:
The following message is referred to.

Basically Schindler (lift, elevator maker) wants to recruit fresh graduates (engineering & business). They are going to organize an Open Day. Date & Time is TBD.

If you're interested to participate in the Open Day, please email your following info to ylfoo@mmu.edu.my before 11 Apr 2018.

 

1. Name: 

2. Degree Programme: 

3. Email: 

4. Tel: 

 

Thank you.

 

Regards,

Foo

 

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Privish Singh Harbans Singh <privish.singh.harbans.singh@schindler.com>
Date: Mon, Apr 2, 2018 at 4:07 PM
Subject: Open Day invitation.

 

On behalf of Antah Schindler Sdn Bhd, we would like to invite your students for our Open Day at our Training Center in Balakong.

 

The objective of the Open Day is to promote an overview of our business and talent pipeline acquisition. This open day is to encourage the younger generation for our apprenticeship program which includes Field Engineering Development Program (FEDP) and Graduate Trainee Program (GTP).

 

Let me brief the FEDP and GTP program.  It is based more to technical skills and GTP is for management competency which will be attach to the company for 24 months and 18 months respectively. Our target groups would be from Mechanical Engineer, Electrical Engineer and Mechatronics Engineer as well as business field.

 

On the other side, we would like to know your students availability to fit into our Open day and would accommodate 20 pax in total for the targeted groups. In addition, there will be a few higher education institute that we are inviting as well.

 

Last but not least, we hope to hear from you soon on the avalability of your students so that we could schedule the date, time and further details that required.

 

 

Thank you and regards

Privish Singh.

 

 

Privish Singh | Field Engineer (FEDP)
Mobile (017) 209 8204

title: Government of Ireland Scholarship AIT Ireland
html:
Government of Ireland Scholarship AIT Ireland

 

Athlone Institute of Technology (AIT) is offering 1 scholarship to undertake research at  AIT if the applicant receives funding from the Government of Ireland Scholarship process.

 

The candidate will first need to submit application to AIT and receive letter of offer. The candidate will then need to apply before 23 March for Government of Ireland Scholarship.

 

This scholarship may suit a Masters or PhD student to complete one year of research with no award or graduate student to complete Masters by Research over 18 months at AIT. Total scholarship is a tuition fee waiver plus €10,000 towards living expenses. Average living expenses for a student in Athlone for 12 months are €7,000.

 

If this scholarship is of interest to you, please kindly complete the AIT application form and return it to Ms. Indah Sidek from the International Relations Unit (indah.sidek@gmail.com) on or before 20 MARCH 2018. If successful, the student will receive an offer letter from AIT and then will have to apply online to the Government of Ireland:

http://hea.ie/policy/internationalisation/international-funding-schemes/

 

Please kindly note that:

* The scholarship amount is €10,000 for a one year full time study period at;

- the final year of an undergraduate programme;

- one year of a taught master degree programme or;

- one year of a research programme (i.e. one year of a 2 year research masters or a 3-4 year PhD programme).

 

* The number of scholarships has been set at 60.

* Applicants should be in receipt of an offer(conditional or final) from an eligible HEI

* The Call is open to applicants with a domiciliary of origin  NOT EQUAL TO THE EU/EEA OR SWITZERLAND

* Applications should be submitted by individual applicants and not by host Institutions

* The application form should be submitted to this email address GOI-IES2018@hea.ie

 

THE DEADLINE FOR RECEIPT OF APPLICATIONS ON THE GOVERNMENT OF IRELAND PORTAL IS 17.00 IRISH TIME ON FRIDAY, 23 MARCH 2018.
